Package p3proiectir

Class Actions

java.lang.Object
p3proiectir.Actions
public class Actions extends Object
Contains most of the methods related to making changes in the DB

    • Actions

      public Actions()

  • Method Details

    • SQLOnLaunch

      public static String SQLOnLaunch()
      Runs the SQL script to create tables if they don't already exist.
      Returns:
      0 If all went well, the error as a string if something went wrong

    • send_money

      public static int send_money​(int user_id, double money, int sender_id)
      Connects to the database and transfers money between users

      Connects to the database, checks if the user id exists. If it does, the data is modified and the transfer takes place.

      Parameters:
      user_id - id of the user the money is sent to.
      money - amount of money sent
      sender_id - id of the sender
      Returns:
      0 If all went well, 3 if user doesn't exist

    • get_db_info

      public static Object get_db_info​(String cardNum, String pinin) throws SQLException
      Gets card info from the database

      This is called when the user tries to log in, it checks the pin and the numbers and if they match with the data, the program takes the information from the database. The rest of the information is then extracted based on the card type and the card type specific class constructor is called.

      Parameters:
      cardNum - card numbers inserted and used in the select
      pinin - pin inserted and used in the select
      Returns:
      0 if everything goes well
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • deposit

      public static int deposit​(int user_id, double money)
      Adds money to the user's balance.

      It updates the user account's balance in the account table and returns 0 if no issues occur.

      Parameters:
      user_id - id of the account the money is gonna be deposited on.
      money - amount of money that will be added to the account.
      Returns:
      0 if there are no issues.

    • cdeposit

      public static int cdeposit​(int cid, double money)
      Adds money to the company's funds.

      It updates the company's funds in the company table and returns 0 if no issues occur.

      Parameters:
      cid - id of the company the money is gonna be deposited to.
      money - amount of money that will be added to the funds.
      Returns:
      0 if there are no issues.

    • withdraw

      public static int withdraw​(int user_id, double money)
      Withdraws money from the user account's balance

      It updates the user's balance and returns 0 if everything goes well.

      Parameters:
      user_id - id of the user which the money is withdrawn from
      money - the amount of money withdrawn
      Returns:
      0 if everything goes well.

    • cwithdraw

      public static int cwithdraw​(int cid, double money)
      Withdraws money from the company's funds

      It updates the company's funds and returns 0 if everything goes well.

      Parameters:
      cid - id of the company which the money is withdrawn from
      money - the amount of money withdrawn
      Returns:
      0 if everything goes well.

    • create_card_business

      public static int create_card_business​(int holderId, int pin, String numbers, String tip, int companyid, double spendlimit)
      Inserts a new business card into the database

      It inserts a new card in the cardmain table and the extra information it has in the cardbusiness table.

      Parameters:
      holderId - id of the user who owns the card
      pin - password of the card
      numbers - the numbers of the card
      tip - the type of the card
      companyid - the id of the company
      spendlimit - the daily withdraw limit for company funds this card has.
      Returns:
      0 if all goes well.

    • create_card_student

      public static int create_card_student​(int holderId, int pin, String numbers, String tip, String university)
      Inserts a new student card into the database

      It inserts a new card in the cardmain table and the extra information it has in the cardstudent table.

      Parameters:
      holderId - id of the user who owns the card
      pin - password of the card
      numbers - the numbers of the card
      tip - the type of the card
      university - is the name of the university the user studies at
      Returns:
      0 if all goes well.

    • create_account

      public static int create_account​(String user)
      Inserts a new account into the database
      Parameters:
      user - the name the user will have
      Returns:
      id of the newly inserted user

    • create_company

      public static int create_company​(String name)
      Inserts a new company into the database
      Parameters:
      name - the name the company will have
      Returns:
      id of the newly inserted company
